name: Aircraft Infinity
description:
game based on old space games
Embark on an epic journey!
We present you a fun game in which you pilot an aircraft and your mission is to destroy pieces of a large asteroid that has broken into millions of pieces no universo, and is heading towards Earth, and your mission is to save the planet terra.

Game features
*Space simulation genre
*The game Aircraft Infinity indie
*English only game
*100 achievements
*Get the best rating possible
